newsitem.title: USA: La Jolla calls high trading volume "inexplicable".
newsitem.headline: La Jolla calls high trading volume "inexplicable".

text.p: La Jolla Diagnostics Inc said Monday it has learned of an inexplicable increase in the trading volume in its shares.
At 1530 EST/2030 GMT 2,704,100 shares of the stock had traded, including 85 block trades totaling 1,521,400 shares.

The company added that while it is engaged in the development and marketing of diagnostic tests, ophthalmic and other consumer health care products, it is not in the business of providing outside diagnostic laboratory services and has no plans to enter that market.
Further, La Jolla said it has not entered into any negotiations, letters of intent, or agreements to provide diagnostic or other laboratory services.

The company said it has developed and is marketing Living Water Eye Lotion, and plans to introduce a number of new products based upon the same formulating technology. It also said it is developing diagnostic products, including a DNA fingerprinting test for breast cancer.
